title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 62-2.4 - Requests for insurance loss information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 62-2.4 - Requests for insurance loss information

State Regulations

In accordance with the provisions of Insurance Law section 318, information reported to the central organization pursuant to this Subpart shall be made available to law enforcement agencies, tax districts that have, pursuant to the provisions of section
22
of the General Municipal Law, filed with the superintendent a notice of intention to claim against the proceeds of a policy of fire insurance, and governmental agencies charged with the responsibility of demolition of structures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
62-2.4

Amended, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 27, effective
7/9/2014

Amended

New

York State Register September 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 38, eff. 9/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
